comment: The article provides detailed analysis of the causes of weight gain despite exercise habits. It discusses metabolic rates of people who do and do not exercise. The eating habits of people who do and do not exercise was discussed. People who workout and then decide to consume  extra calories versus people who exercise but do not consume extra calories showed that those who do not consume those extra calories after their exercise routine did lose weight. So people who want to lose weight should exercise watch what they eat and avoid extra snacking and treats which add on to their calorie intake.
Article.Title: Why So Many of Us Don’t Lose Weight When We Exercise

comment: I think it is important to modernize the Endangered Species Act for the modern times because we have higher energy demand for automobiles and logistics like shipping and trucking. I believe that we can balance the need for economic efficiency and growth with conserving the habitat of endangered species. It is important to take a look and examine this law to see how it should work in favor of the environment and the American people. “We’re all aware that the Endangered Species Act hasn’t undergone any significant updates in over 40 years” said Representative Rob Bishop Republican of Utah and chairman of the House Natural Resources Committee in a statement. “Now is the time to modernize this antiquated law to simultaneously benefit both endangered species and the American people.”
Article.Title: Lawmakers, Lobbyists and the Administration Join Forces to Overhaul the Endangered Species Act

comment: The article provides detailed analysis of the causes of weight gain despite exercise habits. It discusses metabolic rates of people who do and do not exercise. The eating habits of people who do and do not exercise was discussed. People who workout and then decide to consume  extra calories versus people who exercise but do not consume extra calories showed that those who do not consume those extra calories after their exercise routine did lose weight. So people who want to lose weight should exercise watch what they eat and avoid extra snacking and treats which add on to their calorie intake.
Article.Title: Why So Many of Us Don’t Lose Weight When We Exercise

comment: I think it is important to modernize the Endangered Species Act for the modern times because we have higher energy demand for automobiles and logistics like shipping and trucking. I believe that we can balance the need for economic efficiency and growth with conserving the habitat of endangered species. It is important to take a look and examine this law to see how it should work in favor of the environment and the American people. “We’re all aware that the Endangered Species Act hasn’t undergone any significant updates in over 40 years” said Representative Rob Bishop Republican of Utah and chairman of the House Natural Resources Committee in a statement. “Now is the time to modernize this antiquated law to simultaneously benefit both endangered species and the American people.”
Article.Title: Lawmakers, Lobbyists and the Administration Join Forces to Overhaul the Endangered Species Act
